data.actual_result: options for share channel and share channel invite link disappears until u leave the channel box
data.expected_result: the options for "create channel invite" and "edit channel" should stay where they were
data.short_description: open quick Switcher via hotkey while hovering over channel will make their options for invite & settings disappear
data.steps_to_repro: - let ur mouse hover over the invite or setting option of a text channel in which u aren't at the moment to make the black "create channel invite" or "edit channel" box appear - open quick switcher - observe background - close quickswitcher by just clicking on your mose - move ur mouse a bit in the box of that channel
